title: 3 and Out - Russ/Hawks Divorce Vibes;  Big Ben Price Break; Free Agency Red Flags; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Russ/Hawks Divorce Vibes;  Big Ben Price Break; Free Agency Red Flags; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why the Russell Wilson/Seahawks divorce seems more inevitable every day, why Big Ben returning to Pittsburgh on a discount was his only option, what red flags he would avoid during free agency, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
